lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Manila is being more cautious and aims at soft borrowings which, it is hoped, will be outstripped by annual growth rates and eventually result in the country emerging from debt in five or six years."

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The World Bank sources said the request for land reform funding would be discussed at a meeting of the World Bank-led consultative group to be held alongside the April 27-29 annual meeting of the Asian Development Bank (ADB) in Osaka.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The officials said negotiations will start next month on another 150 mln dlr loan sought by Manila to carry out reforms in 14 major state-owned corporations.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Manila is being more cautious and aims at soft borrowings which, it is hoped, will be outstripped by annual growth rates and eventually result in the country emerging from debt in five or six years."

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The World Bank sources said the request for land reform funding would be discussed at a meeting of the World Bank-led consultative group to be held alongside the April 27-29 annual meeting of the Asian Development Bank (ADB) in Osaka.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The officials said negotiations will start next month on another 150 mln dlr loan sought by Manila to carry out reforms in 14 major state-owned corporations.
